item.title: Hosted Network Monitoring Services
item.description:
The increasing reliance on electronic transactions, online services, and cloud technologies has made networks essential for businesses. This dependence requires IT departments to prioritize network monitoring, either through in-house solutions or external providers. While companies have traditionally monitored their internal networks, extending this practice to telecom connections is crucial. This includes dedicated lines, public internet connections, and VPNs. Let’s explore ways to enhance network monitoring processes. Smaller businesses often face challenges with network monitoring outside of business hours...
